Sequence Information.Target Organism: Tumor cells:HeLa S3 (IC50=1 µM); THP-1 (IC50=25 µM); U-937 (IC50=6.25 µM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:nonhemolytic up to 400 μM, and their equimolar mixture at that concentration caused only 7% hemolysis
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: Human Splenic Fibroblasts (HSF):IC50=12.78±0.33 µg/mL; Endometrial epithelial cells(HEEC):IC50=2.66±0.34 µg/mL; HPDE6c7 Human Pancreatic Duct Epithelial Cell:IC50=3.45±0.20 µg/mL; Normal Human Hepatic Cell (Lo-2):IC50=2.91±0.07 µg/mL; NCM460:IC50=3.04±0.10 µg/mL; CCD-19Lu:IC50=4.76±0.03 µg/mL
